DOC.brief_summary: This clinical study investigate AMG 719 , investigational drug , treatment patient Rheumatoid Arthritis take Methotrexate . AMG 719 drug self-injected beneath skin ( similarly way insulin self-injected diabetic ) . Patients study study 28-weeks . They visit study facility least 11 time participate study .
